0: So in sum the hotel looks good and has a great view
food verity was very good the view from the room and around the hotel is very good close distance from the beach nice and clean beach
Every thing is good also beach activities and foods are perfect and the best part is in room services
For my daughters birthday wine and cake were left in the suite for us best hotel experience ever
Room was of a good size stayed in an Ocean Premium Leisure Club Room which means that you get your breakfast in the club as well as afternoon snacks and alcoholic drinks between 6 pm and 8 pm
Very clean respectful staff and lovely rooms

Everybody is very friendly from the driver who picked us up at the Airport to the lovely man who cleaned our room making creatures out of towels staff on the beach staff during happy hour who at 75pm always filled your glass up
We stayed in an Ocean Deluxe Balcony on the 7th floor which was perfect
The villa was excellent and the 247 butler service was really good
Beautiful location with Burj Al Arab view from our Ocean Deluxe Balcony room
1: I would recommend pushing the boat out and booking a club room as this is excellent and offers many extras including transport to and from airport
We are picked up in style from the airport shown to our room very quickly
We ate at an Italian restaurant on the 50th floor of the Emirate Towers the night time view of Dubai provided a stunning setingdo not forget to see the fountain display google it
I am not sure if this is standard or if just for club room guests but I recommend the main downstairs restaurant as the variety of the food was excellent and there were food choices for everyone
Okay we were earlier than their recommended time but three rooms and seven hours later was not the usual standard from previous visits
Both times room was one king bed and all bedding feathers pillows duvet everything
2: I even asked for another tote bag during our stay and they just sent one up no questions askedAs much water as you need and fresh fruit into the room each day
They also kept our luggage for us and gave us the room code so we could go to the wild wadi water park
The rooms had recently been refurbished to an excellent standard Plenty of restaurants to choose from But travellers beware Dubai is expensive
The view from the room balcony was excellent but you had to be standing to see it over the solid outside wall of the balcony area
food is average with nice view of Burj Al Arab
I really like my view from my hotel room
Fantastic Holiday but noise in our room was an issue
Safety around the pools ie number of life guards Exceptional Quality of service from all members of staff Exceptional Cleanliness of rooms and all facilities Outstanding
I arrived extremely early and no issue to get a room
Gorgeous views but terribly slow staff
3: The check in was very smooth and we checked in so early room 9 am
Pros service ambiance food rooms location facilities including the beach
Let me be honest this was one of my favorite hotels in Dubai amazing staff great rooms lovely view of burj al Arab and great beach
The view is also amazing from the beach

So when we arrived at the airport we was greeted amazingly by staff at the hotel and taken straight to our room which was an ocean beach club room with a great view of the Burj Khalifa one side but then horrible construction on the other side
Room is very comfy and tidy
Rooms are clean and very comfortable
Amazing food at this place great view and very nice staff
Breathtaking view over to the sea and Burj al Arab modern rooms spotlessly clean beach area
